channel.title: Physician's Reanimate ability had unseen options
channel.description: #### What happened? At night, a physician had options to reanimate an unseen (and possibly cult) player. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Only BD should be an option. #### Steps to reproduce: 1) Be a Physician 2) Check reanimate options after unseen death. Sometimes, I found that physician revive options changed between nights during this glitch, so it may take multiple nights #### Comments: There may be other requirements that I simply don't know as it'd be tricky to re-create this repeatedly expecting the same results. Proof (11 is dead unseen, but reanimate says he can be revived): [https://imgur.com/a/DQITY]

item.title: Physician's Reanimate ability had unseen options
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
It’s not a bug. Try to keep discussions to minimum please. o/

Read full topic

item.title: Physician's Reanimate ability had unseen options
item.dc:creator: Loudo
item.description:
but they’re already dead, so they already know

The Herbalist can make dead players appear as a class other than their own. So if you had the option to select only real BDs, you’d instantly be able to tell who was defiled.

Read full topic

item.title: Physician's Reanimate ability had unseen options
item.dc:creator: Loudo
item.description:
I’m pretty sure this was changed on purpose a while back so that the Physician (and previously the Priest) couldn’t immediately tell who was defiled by the Herbalist.

Read full topic

item.title: Physician's Reanimate ability had unseen options
item.dc:creator: TheButterMage
item.description:
What happened?

At night, a physician had options to reanimate an unseen (and possibly cult) player.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Only BD should be an option.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Be a Physician
  2. Check reanimate options after unseen death. Sometimes, I found that physician revive options changed between nights during this glitch, so it may take multiple nights

Comments:

There may be other requirements that I simply don’t know as it’d be tricky to re-create this repeatedly expecting the same results.
Proof (11 is dead unseen, but reanimate says he can be revived): [https://imgur.com/a/DQITY]

Read full topic
item.source: Physician's Reanimate ability had unseen options
